'''2.29.11''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|Launcher]] released on August 15, 2024.

== Additions ==
* Added timer to carousel play/pause button on home page.

* Java Realms page bug fixes.
* A bunch of under the hood bug fixes and UI improvements.
